Package com.mta.tehreer.layout

Provides classes related to text layout and typesetting.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComposedFrame
    Represents a frame containing multiple lines of text.
    ComposedLine
    Represents a line of text consisting of an array of GlyphRun objects in visual order.
    FrameResolver
    This class resolves text frames by using a typesetter object.
    GlyphRun
    A GlyphRun object is a collection of consecutive glyphs sharing the same attributes and direction.
    Typesetter
    Represents a typesetter which performs text layout.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BreakMode
    Specifies the text break mode.
    TextAlignment
    Specifies the horizontal text alignment.
    TruncationPlace
    Specifies the text truncation place.
    VerticalAlignment
    Specifies the vertical content alignment.

Package com.mta.tehreer.layout Description

Provides classes related to text layout and typesetting.
